analyzed: ārya maitreya praṇītā madhya anta vibhāga kārikā
lakṣaṇam hi āvṛtiḥ tattvam pratipakṣasya bhāvanā
tatra avasthā phala prāptiḥ yāna ānuttaryam eva ca
abhūta parikalpaḥ asti dvayam tatra na vidyate

original: śūnyatā vidyate tvatra tasyāmapi sa vidyate // Mvk_1.2 //
analyzed: śūnyatā vidyate tu atra tasyām api sa vidyate

original: na śūnyaṃ nāpi cāśūnyaṃ tasmāt sarvaṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: na śūnyam na api ca a śūnyam tasmāt sarvam vidhīyate

original: sattvādasattvāt sattvācca madhyamā pratipacca sā // Mvk_1.3 //
analyzed: sattvāt asattvāt sattvāt ca madhyamā pratipad ca sā
artha sattva ātma vijñapti pratibhāsam prajāyate
vijñānam nā asti ca asya arthaḥ tad abhāvāt tat api asat
abhūta parikalpa tvam siddham asya bhavati atas
na tathā sarvathābhāvāt tad kṣayāt muktiḥ iṣyate
kalpitaḥ paratantraḥ ca pariniṣpannaḥ eva ca
arthāt abhūta kalpāt ca dvaya abhāvāt ca deśitaḥ
upalabdhim samāśritya na upalabdhiḥ prajāyate
na upalabdhim samāśritya na upalabdhiḥ prajāyate
upalabdheḥ tatas siddhā nā upalabdhi svabhāva tā
tasmāt ca sama tā jñeyā na upalambha upalambhayoḥ
abhūta parikalpaḥ ca citta caittāḥ tri dhātukāḥ
tatra artha dṛṣṭiḥ vijñānam tad viśeṣe tu caitasāḥ
evam pratyaya vijñānam dvitīyam ca aupabhogikam
upabhoga pariccheda prerakāḥ tatra caitasāḥ
chādanāt ropaṇāt ca eva nayanāt saṃparigrahāt
pūraṇāt tri paricchedāt upabhogāt ca karṣaṇāt
duḥkhanāt kliśyate jagat

original: tredhā dvedhā ca saṃkleśaḥ saptadhābhūtakalpanāt // Mvk_1.12 //
analyzed: tredhā dvedhā ca saṃkleśaḥ saptadhā bhūta kalpanāt

original: lakṣaṇaṃ cātha paryāyastadartho bheda eva ca /
analyzed: lakṣaṇam ca atha paryāyaḥ tad arthaḥ bhedaḥ eva ca
sādhanam ca iti vijñeyam śūnyatāyāḥ samāsatas
dvaya abhāvaḥ hi abhāvasya bhāvaḥ śūnyasya lakṣaṇam

original: na bhāvo nāpi cābhāvao na pṛthaktvaikalakṣaṇam // Mvk_1.14 //
analyzed: na bhāvaḥ na api ca abhāvaḥ na pṛthaktva eka lakṣaṇam
tathatā bhūtakoṭiḥ ca animittam paramārtha tā
dharmadhātuḥ ca paryāyāḥ śūnyatāyāḥ samāsatas
hetu tvāt ca ārya dharmaṇām paryāya arthaḥ yathākramam

original: saṃkliṣṭā ca viśuddhā ca samalā nirmalā ca sā /
analyzed: saṃkliṣṭā ca viśuddhā ca sa malā nirmalā ca sā
ap dhātu kanaka ākāśa śuddhi vat śuddhiḥ iṣyate
bhoktṛ bhojana tad heha pratiṣṭhā vastu śūnyatā

original: tacca yena yathā dṛṣṭaṃ yadarthaṃ tasya śūnyatā // Mvk_1.18 //
analyzed: tat ca yena yathā dṛṣṭam yad artham tasya śūnyatā
śubha dvayasya prāpti artha sadā sattva hitāya ca
saṃsāra a tyajana artham ca kuśalasya akṣayāya ca
gotrasya ca viśuddhayartham lakṣaṇa vyañjana āptaye
śuddhaye buddha dharmāṇām bodhisattvaḥ prapadyate
pudgalasya atha dharmāṇām abhāvaḥ śūnyatā atra hi
tad abhāvasya sadbhāvaḥ tasmin sā śūnyatā parā
saṃkliṣṭā ced bhavet na asau muktāḥ syuḥ sarva dehinaḥ

original: viśuddhā cedbhavennāsau vyāyāmo niṣphalo bhavet // Mvk_1.22 //
analyzed: viśuddhā ced bhavet na asau vyāyāmaḥ niṣphalaḥ bhavet

original: na kliṣṭā nāpi va 'ākliṣṭā śuddhāśuddhā na caiva sā /
analyzed: na kliṣṭā na api vaḥ ākliṣṭā śuddha aśuddhā na ca eva sā
prabhāsvara tvāt cittasya kleśasya āgantuka tvataḥ
iti lakṣaṇa paricchedaḥ prathamaḥ
āvaraṇa paricchedaḥ dvitīyaḥ
vyāpi prādeśika udrikta samādāna vivarjanam
dvaya āvaraṇam ākhyātam navadhā kleśa lakṣaṇam
saṃyojana anyāvaraṇam udvega samupekṣayoḥ
tattva dṛṣṭeḥ ca sat kāya dṛṣṭeḥ tad vastunaḥ ca
nirodha mārga ratneṣu lābha satkāre eva ca
saṅkleśasya parijñāne śubha ādau daśadhā aparam
a prayogaḥ na āyatane yoga vihitaḥ ca yaḥ
na utpattiḥ amanaskāraḥ sambhārasya a prapūrṇa tā
gotra mitrasya vaidhuryam cittasya parikhedi tā
pratipatteḥ ca vaidhuryam kuduṣṭa jana vāsa tā
dauṣṭhulyam avaśiṣṭa tvam trayāt prajñā vipakva tā

original: prakṛtyā caiva dauṣṭhulyaṃ kausīdyaṃ ca pramāditā // Mvk_2.6 //
analyzed: prakṛtyā ca eva dauṣṭhulyam kausīdyam ca pramādi tā

original: saktirbhave ca bhoge ca līnacittatvameva ca /
analyzed: saktiḥ bhave ca bhoge ca līna citta tvam eva ca
aśraddhā anadhimuktiḥ ca yathā ruta vicāraṇā
saddharme gauravam lābhe guru tā a kṛpa tā tathā
śruta vyasanam alpa tvam samādhi a parikarmi tā
śubham bodhiḥ samādānam dhīmattva abhrānti anāvṛtī
nṛtya trāsaḥ matsari tvam vaśi tvañca śubha ādayaḥ

original: trīṇi trīṇi ca eteṣāṃ jñeyānyāvaraṇāni hi /
analyzed: trīṇi trīṇi ca eteṣām jñeyāni āvaraṇāni hi
pakṣya pāramitā bhūmiṣu anyat āvaraṇam punar
vastu akauśala kausīdyam samādheḥ dvaya hīna tā
aropaṇā atha daurbalyam dṛṣṭi dauṣṭhulya duṣṭa tā
aiśvaryasya atha sugateḥ sattva a tyāgasya ca āvṛtiḥ
hāni vṛddhyoḥ ca doṣāṇām guṇānām avatāraṇe
vimocane kṣaya tve ca nairantarye śubhasya ca
niyatīkaraṇe dharma sambhoga paripācane
sarvatraga arthe agra arthe nisyanda agra arthe eva ca

original: niṣparigrahatārtha ca santānābheda eva ca // Mvk_2.14 //
analyzed: ca santāna abhedaḥ eva ca
nissaṅkleśa viśuddhi arthe nānātva arthe eva ca
ahīna anadhika arthe ca caturdhā vaśitā āśraye
dharmadhātau avidyā iyam akliṣṭā daśadhā āvṛtiḥ
daśa bhūmi vipakṣeṇa pratipakṣāḥ tu bhūmayaḥ
kleśa āvaraṇam ākhyātam jñeya āvaraṇam eva ca
sarvāṇi āvaraṇāni iha yad kṣayāt muktiḥ iṣyate
iti āvaraṇa paricchedaḥ dvitīyaḥ
tattva paricchedaḥ tṛtīyaḥ
mūla lakṣaṇa tattvam aviparyāsa lakṣaṇam
phala hetu mayam tattvam sūkṣma audārikam eva ca
prasiddham śuddhi viṣayam saṅgrāhyam bheda lakṣaṇam
kauśalya tattvam daśadhā ātma dṛṣṭi vipakṣataḥ
svabhāvaḥ trividhaḥ sat ca nityam sat ca api atattvataḥ
sat asat tattvataḥ ca iti svabhāva trayam iṣyate
samāropa apavādasya dharma pudgalayoḥ iha
grāhya grāhakayoḥ ca api bhāva abhāve ca darśanam
yad jñānāt na pravarteta tat hi tattvasya lakṣaṇam
asat arthaḥ hi anitya arthaḥ utpāda da vyaya lakṣaṇaḥ
sa mala amala bhāvena mūla tattve yathākramam
duḥkham ādāna lakṣma ākhyam sambandhena aparam matam
abhāvaḥ ca api a tad bhāvaḥ prakṛtiḥ śūnyatā matā
alakṣaṇam ca nairātmyam tad vilakṣaṇam eva ca
sva lakṣaṇam ca nirdiṣṭam duḥkha satyam atas matam
vāsanā atha samutthānam avisaṃyogaḥ eva ca
svabhāva dvayana utpattiḥ mala śānti dvayam matam
parijñāyām prahāṇe ca prāpti sākṣātkṛtau ayam
mārga satyam samākhyātam prajñapti pratipattitaḥ
tathā udbhāvanayā audāram ekatas
artha prāpti prapattyā hi parama arthaḥ tridhā mataḥ
nirvikāra aviparyāsa pariniṣpattitaḥ dvayam
loka prasiddham ekasmāt trayāt yukti prasiddhakam
viśuddha gocaram dvedhā ekasmāt eva kīrtitam
nimittasya vikalpasya nāmnaḥ ca dvaya saṅgrahaḥ
samyak jñāna sa tattvasya ekena eva ca saṅgrahaḥ
pravṛtti tattvam dvividham sanniveśa kupanna tā
ekam lakṣaṇa vijñapti śuddhi samyak prapanna tā
eka hetu tva bhoktṛ tva kartṛ tva vaśa vartane
ādhipatya artha nitya tve kleśa śuddhi āśraye ca
ātma darśanam eṣu hi
parikalpa vikalpa artha dharmatā arthena teṣu te
aneka tva abhisaṅkṣepa pariccheda arthaḥ āditas

param
punar hetu phala āyāsa an āropa anapavādataḥ

param
phala hetu upayoga arthanā upayogāt tathā aparam

original: asaṃskāro 'tha saṃskāraḥ pañca doṣā ime matāḥ // Mvk_4.4 //
analyzed: saṃskāraḥ pañca doṣāḥ ime matāḥ
āśrayaḥ tha āśritaḥ tasya nimittam phalam eva ca

ropite mokṣa bhāgīye chanda yoga ādhipatyataḥ

original: vipakṣasya hi saṃlekhāt pūrvasya phalamuttaram // Mvk_4.7 //

dvau dvau nirvedha bhāgīyau indriyāṇi balāni ca

ānukūlyāt vipakṣāt ca visaṃyogāt viśeṣataḥ

iti pratipakṣa bhāvanā ādi paricchedaḥ caturthaḥ
yāna ānuttarya paricchedaḥ pañcamaḥ
ānuttaryaṃprapattau hi punar ālambane matam

original: samudāgama uddiṣṭaṃ pratipattistu ṣaḍ vidhā // Mvk_5.1 //
analyzed: samudāgamaḥ uddiṣṭam pratipattiḥ tu ṣaḍ vidhā
paramātha manaskāre anudharme nta varjane

original: viśiṣṭā cāviśiṣṭā ca paramā dvādaśātmikā // Mvk_5.2 //

original: tataśca paramārthena daśa pāramitā matāḥ // Mvk_5.4 //
analyzed: tatas ca parama arthena daśa pāramitāḥ matāḥ

original: dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣamā vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā upāyatā /
analyzed: dānam śīlam kṣamā vīryam dhyānam prajñā upāya tā

original: praṇidhānaṃ balaṃ jñānametāḥ pāramitā daśa // Mvk_5.5 //
analyzed: praṇidhānam balam jñānam etāḥ pāramitāḥ daśa
anugrahaḥ vighātaḥ ca karma tasya ca marṣaṇam

original: lekhanā pūjanā dānaṃ śravaṇaṃ vācanod grahaḥ // Mvk_5.9 //

original: ameyapuṇyaskandhaṃ hi caritaṃ tad daśātmakam // Mvk_5.10 //
analyzed: ameya puṇya skandham hi caritam tat daśa ātmakam
viśeṣāt akṣaya tvāt ca śamāt
avikṣiptā aviparyāsa praṇatā ca anudhārmikī
vyutthānam viṣaye sāraḥ tathā āsvāda laya uddhavaḥ
sambhāvanā abhisandhiḥ ca manaskāre pi ahaṃkṛtiḥ
vikṣepaḥ parijñeyaḥ hi dhīmatā
vyañjana artha manaskāre visāre lakṣaṇa dvaye
aśuddha śuddhau āgantuka tve trāsita anunnatau
saṃyogāt saṃstavāt ca eva viyogāt api a saṃstavāt
artha sattvam asattvam ca vyañjane saḥ viparyayaḥ
dvayena pratibhāsa tvam tathā ca avidyamāna tā
arthe sa ca aviparyāsaḥ sat asat tvena varjitaḥ
tad jalpa bhāvitaḥ jalpa manaskāraḥ tad āśrayaḥ
manaskāre viparyāsaḥ dvaya prakhyāna kāraṇe
māyā ādi vat asattvam ca sattvam ca arthasya tat matam
saḥ visāre viparyāsaḥ bhāva abhāva avisārataḥ
sarvasya nāma mātra tvam sarva kalpa a pravṛttaye
sva lakṣaṇe viparyāsaḥ paramārthe sva lakṣaṇe

original: dharmadhātuvinirmukto yasmād dharmo na vidyate // Mvk_5.19 //
analyzed: dharmadhātu vinirmuktaḥ yasmāt dharmaḥ na vidyate

dharmadhātoḥ viśuddha tvāt prakṛtyāḥ vyoma vat punar
dvayasya āgantuka tvam hi sa ca tatra aviparyayaḥ

asattvāt na atas

original: vikalpadvayatāntaśca sa ca saptavidho mataḥ // Mvk_5.25 //

original: viśiṣṭā cāviśiṣṭā ca jñeyā daśasu bhūmiṣu // Mvk_5.27 //
